QuestData.Title: A Thousand Words
QuestData.Description:
With all that we've learned here, I can't imagine moving on without a memento.
Would you be kind enough to take my picture next to the proto-dragon fossils?
QuestData.LogDescription: Photograph Dervishian near the Proto-Dragon Skeleton.
QuestData.RewardText:
Someday, I hope to fight for my people with the same bravery as this proto-dragon in its final moments.
Thanks again, $n.

Objectives.Objective: Photograph Dervishian near the Proto-Dragon Skeleton
